arts.ttl: Croatia, Denmark qualify for Nations League quarterfinals with draws
arts.sum: Denmark and Croatia qualified for the Nations League quarterfinals after both sides secured draws on Monday. Northern Ireland and Romania will step up to League B after topping their groups.

arts.ttl: Zirkzee IN, Vlahovic OUT? Juventus make decision Man Utd flop
arts.sum: Joshua Zirkzee is seen as the ideal striker for Juventus, but a move would hinge heavily on the future of Dusan Vlahovic, according to Italian media. "Yes, I like playing with another striker alongside me," he said while away on international duty with Serbia, "I feel good but it also depends on the coach.
